[[Version 5.1]]
* '''October 9, 2024:'''
** Updated interface to open the "Abyssal Moon Spire" directly if the "Abyss Corridor" has been completed with full stars.
* '''October 16, 2024:'''
** Added Spiral Abyss skip function.
*** After completing Floor 11 in the previous Cycle at full stars, the full star rewards for Floor 9 of the current Cycle can be claimed.
*** After completing Floor 12 in the previous Cycle at full stars, the full star rewards for Floor 9 and Floor 10 of the current Cycle can be claimed.
*** All Chamber Bounties for the skipped floors can be claimed directly via the review pop-up. However, the Primogem rewards from Star's Bounty will still need to be claimed manually.
** The enemies and Ley Line Disorders within the Abyssal Moon Spire (Floors 11 and 12) were altered. ([[Spiral Abyss/Floors/2024-09-16|Old Floors]], [[Spiral Abyss/Floors/2024-10-16|New Floors]])
